Author: Tiny_Buttercups98
Text: Yeah it really sucks. I mean today is just a garbage day anyways. Hopefully it's just my body being a dick about water

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I’ve had the same thing happen!!! I felt so frustrated and confused and...I guess betrayed by my body. I mean, I can hypothesize that it’s due to water weirdness and to weight loss being intrinsically nonlinear. But the *feeling* when I see that scale number is still a maelstrom of frustration/confusion/sadness.
